amendment.description: To prohibit the use of funds for certain programs, projects, and activities.

action.text: Motion to table amendment SA 1270 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 79 - 16. Record Vote Number: 285.
Amendment SA 1270 proposed by Senator McCain. (consideration: CR S9475-9480; text: CR S9475) To prohibit the use of funds for certain programs, projects, and activities.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to table amendment SA 1270 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 79 - 16. Record Vote Number: 285.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1270 proposed by Senator McCain.
